gameengine.controller

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameengine.controller.Level
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IEditableGameElement, ILevel, java.util.Observer

    public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer, ILevel, IEditableGameElement
    A Level is essentially a package of Actor objects. It is able to relay a Trigger to Actors when it receives one.
    Author:
    blakekaplan

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Level()
      Instantiates the triggerMap and Actor list
